rows.name: Tis But A Scratch!
rows.description: Gain 1 Bleeding Condition.

rows.name: Gut Blow
rows.description: Gain 1 Stunned Condition. Pass an Easy (+40) Endurance Test, or vomit, gaining the Prone Condition.

rows.name: Low Blow!
rows.description: Make a Hard (-20) Endurance Test or gain 3 Stunned Condition.

rows.name: Twisted Back
rows.description: Suffer a Torn Muscle (Minor) injury.

rows.name: Winded
rows.description: Gain a Stunned Condition. Make an Average (+20) Endurance Test, or gain the Prone Condition. Movement is halved for @Roll[1d10] rounds as you get your breath back.

rows.name: Bruised Ribs
rows.description: All Agility-based Tests suffer a -10 penalty for @Roll[1d10] days.

rows.name: Wrenched Collar Bone
rows.description: Randomly select one arm. Drop whatever is held in that hand; the arm is useless for @Roll[1d10] rounds.

rows.name: Ragged Wound
rows.description: Take 2 Bleeding Conditions.

rows.name: Cracked Ribs
rows.description: The hit cracks one or more ribs. Gain a Stunned Condition. Gain a Broken Bone (Minor) injury.

rows.name: Gaping Chest Wound
rows.description: Take 3 Bleeding Conditions. Until you receive Surgery, any Wounds you receive to the Body Hit Location will inflict an additional Bleeding Condition as the cut reopens.

rows.name: Painful Cut
rows.description: Gain 2 Bleeding Conditions and a Stunned Condition. Take a Hard (-20) Endurance Test or gain the Unconscious Condition as you black out from the pain. Unless you achieve 4+ SL, you also scream out in agony.

rows.name: Arterial Damage
rows.description: Gain 4 Bleeding Conditions. Until you receive Surgery, every time you receive Damage to the Body Hit Location, gain 2 Bleeding Conditions.

rows.name: Pulled Back
rows.description: Your back turns to white pain as you pull a muscle. Suffer a Torn Muscle (Major) injury.

rows.name: Fractured Hip
rows.description: Gain a Stunned Condition. Take a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or also gain the Prone Condition. Suffer a Broken Bone (Minor) injury.

rows.name: Major Chest Wound
rows.description: You take a significant wound to your chest, flensing skin from muscle and sinew. Take 4 Bleeding Conditions. Until you receive Surgery, to stitch the wound together, any Wounds you receive to the Body Hit Location will also inflict 2 Bleeding Conditions as the tears reopen.

rows.name: Gut Wound
rows.description: Contract a Festering Wound and gain 2 Bleeding Conditions.

rows.name: Smashed Rib Cage
rows.description: Gain a Stunned Condition that can only be removed through Medical Attention, and suffer a Broken Bone (Major) injury.

rows.name: Broken Collar Bone
rows.description: Gain the Unconscious Condition until you receive Medical Attention, and suffer a Broken Bone (Major) injury.

rows.name: Internal Bleeding
rows.description: Gain a Bleeding Condition that can only be removed through Surgery. Contract Blood Rot.

rows.name: Torn Apart
rows.description: You are hacked in two. The top half lands in a random direction, and all characters within 2 yards are showered in blood.
